hippodrome

Class BettingCentre

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.BettingCentre

  • public class BettingCentre
extends java.lang.Object
    Place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse. As they come here to place their bets, they also come here to collect his (or hers) further gains, if such a scenario applies on a given race.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.Queue<Spectator> bettingQueue
      The waiting queue to contact the Broker on its tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      BettingCentre()

      Accept all the bets done by the Spectators.
      static int goCollectTheGains(Spectator spectator)
      Let a spectator collect all his (or hers) gains after being placed a bet and a race had ended.
      static void honourTheBets()
      Give all the money to the respective betting parts - the Spectators.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bettingQueue

        private static java.util.Queue<Spectator> bettingQueue
        The waiting queue to contact the Broker on its tasks. This could be used while waiting to a Spectator place a bet, or while wainting to a Spectator go collect his (or hers) gains.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BettingCentre

        public BettingCentre()

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTheBets

        public static void acceptTheBets()
        Accept all the bets done by the Spectators.

      • honourTheBets

        public static void honourTheBets()
        Give all the money to the respective betting parts - the Spectators.

      • placeABet

        public static int placeABet(Spectator spectator,
                            int bet,
                            int horse)
        Let a Spectator place a bet onto the BettingCentre. This bet, made by a specific spectator is done respecting a proper horse, which represents a pair Horse/Jockey.
        Parameters:
        spectator - an object of class Spectator which represents a better.
        bet - an amount of money represented as an integer, which the spectator wants to bet.
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey in which the spectator wants to bet.
        Returns:
        the amount of money which was accepted by the Broker to place the bet.

      • goCollectTheGains

        public static int goCollectTheGains(Spectator spectator)
        Let a spectator collect all his (or hers) gains after being placed a bet and a race had ended.
        Parameters:
        spectator - the Spectator which had collected some money after his (or hers) bet.
        Returns:
        the amount of money collected by the spectator.
